alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern Lincoln County; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 24 at 8:37AM MST until January 24 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow will taper off through the morning however lingering slick travel and areas with low visibility are still expected through later this morning. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County, Curry County, De Baca County, Quay County, Roosevelt County, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...Until Noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40, U.S, 285, U.S. 54, and U.S. 60.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern Lincoln County; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Southwest Chaves County
